Job category: Product

Full-stack Software Engineer (Lead) – Golang, Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, React, AWS, Terraform

Do your bit!

Take a step in-to the future and help this UK giant build an exciting internal start-up to help them reach Net Zero!

That’s right, you read it correctly! You can work on the latest technologies and help save the planet at the same time! What an opportunity!

As a Lead Engineer in this small team you’ll be setting examples and helping to implement best practices

You’ll be one of the people the Head of Engineering turns to on architecture and be part of wider conversations around strategy|

So if you have:

  • Experience developing JavaScript and ideally Go, with an appetite to learn and implement new technologies outside Java
  • Well-versed in modern development practices including Agile, DevOps, cloud native and utilising providers such as AWS
  • You are passionate about developing others through mentoring and coaching

Then I’d like to hear from you.

CV ready? Click apply. CV not ready? Email me on b.solomons@trg-uk.com

*One day per fortnight in the office

Looking for your next opportunity with Endur?

I’m working with a global energy company in searching for Endur Architects to work on projects related to Power Trading environments. You will be using your expertise to design the architecture of bespoke trading systems, and be a key advisor to delivery and design reviews.

Experience required:

  • Strong knowledge of Endur (8+ years)
  • Working in Power Trading environments (5+ years)
  • Strong architectural experience across data modelling, design patterns, and integrations

Other details:

  • Up to £1000 per day (inside IR35 for UK based candidates)
  • 6 month contract initially, strong possibility of extension.

If you’d like to learn more, apply or get in touch directly on mgojzewski@trg-uk.com
